dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3548 IH: Improving Trauma Care Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson of Ohio introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XII of the Public Health Service Act to expand the definition of trauma to include thermal, electrical, chemical, radioactive, and other extrinsic agents.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Improving Trauma Care Act of 2013.
Paragraph (4) of section 1231 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300d–31) is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: The term trauma means an injury resulting from exposure to—

subparagraph.text: another extrinsic agent, including an extrinsic agent that is thermal, electrical, chemical, or radioactive.
